text: Simple, and stunning, Jessica Biel gave the kind of red carpet performance at the 2018 Emmy Awards that we all want to channel. Well, luckily, her glam squad behind the scenes shared the secrets to creating her romantic look. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Hair Adir Abergel, Hollywood ’ s go - to hair guy gave Biel “ soft ethereal hair ”, inspired by Pre - Raphaelite imagery. How? The creative director for Virtue Labs ( launching in the UK later this month ) used the brand ’ s Moisture Defining Whip ( £34 ) which he blow - dried into Biel's hair. Incidentally, Abergel tells us this is his favourite product at the moment because it ’ s extremely versatile and easy for people to use.
